title: Geneva in 140 Minutes
text:
Category: Switzerland   11:40 Dorchester Collection’s luxury five star property, Le Richemond, has created a speedy 140 minute experience for those with limited time to explore the city, in celebration of its 140th anniversary. As part of the ‘Geneva in 140 Minutes’ package guests can enjoy a 35 minute massage at Le Spa by Sisley and an express lunch at the critically acclaimed Le Jardin, which in spring and summer offers dining on the alfresco Terrace. 
The express tour can then be tailormade by the concierge team depending on the guest’s wishes. Options include a boat tour of the famous Jet d'Eau; a visit to one of Geneva’s famed artisans such as a tour and tasting at a luxury chocolatier; exploring the exquisite craftsmanship and artistry of horology at a specialist gallery where exhibits include sculptures made using time pieces and mechanical butterflies or learn about the history and production of the iconic Swiss knife and then design their own bespoke version. Those with limited time can choose to take their tour in a single 140 minute trip but guests who prefer a slower pace can relax and enjoy the individual elements at their leisure during their stay. ‘Geneva in 140 Minutes’ is available from CHF 1450 per room per night and includes: • Overnight accommodation in a Junior Suite • Breakfast for two • Express 30 minute lunch at Le Jardin • Express 35 minute massage at Le Spa by Sisley • 75 minute Geneva tour - option of one of the following: Jet d'Eau lake tour; visit to a luxury chocolatier, visit to a workshop for the design and creation of bespoke Swiss knife or a visit to a horology gallery. Located on the picturesque shores of Lake Geneva by the famous Jet d’Eau, Le Richemond is in the heart of the city. Founded in 1875, the hotel has welcomed distinguished guests, from Hollywood icons and artists to international dignitaries and authors throughout its history. Related articles
